Posts.Content: trqll wrote: I was wondering how long breast ultrasounds generally take? I had a mammogram and ultrasound for a good sized palpable lump and was surprised that the ultrasound was done in under 5 minutes. The only area that was looked at was where the lump was, is this normal? Thanks in advance. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Ultrasound Question trqll MelissaDallas
